meanings.definition: A person who creates and arranges dances.
meanings.sent1: The choreographer designed a beautiful ballet for the performance.
meanings.sent2: The choreographer taught the dancers the new routine.
meanings.sent3: The choreographer added a funny twist to the dance, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled choreographer, she orchestrated the movements of the dancers effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The choreographer's passion for dance shone through in every step of the routine.

meanings.sent1: She decided to choreograph a contemporary piece for the upcoming show.
meanings.sent2: He choreographed a stunning performance that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: They choreographed a dance routine that was so catchy, everyone started dancing along.
meanings.sent4: The team choreographed their movements perfectly, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Choreographing the final scene was the most challenging part of the production.
